   Did the Crew of Air Force One Refuse to Fly Obama 6000 Miles ‘Just to Play
   Golf’?

Rumors holding that the crew of Air Force One refused to fly President Obama for
non-business purposes originated with a junk news site.

* Dan Evon
     * Published 22 December 2016
   Share on Facebook Share on Twitter Share on Pinterest Share on Reddit
   Share via Email
   Image via FLICKR

  Claim

   The flight crew of Air Force One refused to fly President Obama 6,000
   miles to play a round of golf.

Rating

   False
   False
   About this rating

  Origin

   On 21 December 2016, the web site DailyUSAUpdate.com published an article
   reporting that the flight crew of Air Force One refused to transport
   President Obama to a golf outing during his vacation in Hawaii:

     BREAKING: Crew Of Air Force One Refuses To Fly Obama 6000 Miles ‘Just To
     Play Golf’

     After eight years of flying to Chicago for White Castle burgers,
     bringing Michelle Obama to LA for the afternoon for a hair appointment
     and taking the Obama girls to a park they like in San Fransisco [sic] to
     walk the dog on the government dime, the crew of the famed Air Force One
     has said enough is enough.
